quotes.quote: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: How do we change the world? One random act of kindness at a time. Kindness is a gateway for all of us to connect and care for each other.
quotes.author: Morgan Freeman

quotes.quote: No kind action ever stops with itself. One kind action leads to another. Good example is followed. A single act of kindness throws out roots in all directions, and the roots spring up and make new trees.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi
